Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Ability
    A placeholder interface that is parent to the ItemAbility and HeroAbility enumerations.
    Describable  
    Nameable
    An interface that specifies the object has a name.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BattleScreen  
    GameEnvironment
    Game Environment controls the game.
    GeneralHelpers
    Contains static methods dealing with random state, extracting values from the "strings.json" file and other common methods not covered by the standard library.
    ImageManager
    Manages the loading and caching of images from disk (who would have guessed?!)
    Main
    The main class to be run from the JAR file.
    Settings
    A class to hold the game settings as loaded from the "strings.json" file.
    StreamHelpers
    Simplifies running tests on a text-based user interface.
    Team
    Contains a list of Hero objects and has a name.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GameOverException
    The exception that is thrown when the game is lost.
    GameWonException
    The exception that is thrown when the game is won.
    TeamFullException
